Carnatron turned into Hydras and shot out a fire ball igniting the ground on 
fire creating a fire wall between the maximal troops and flicker. He then 
transformed into Prime's robot mode and fired the big gun at any maximal that 
moved. Carnatron sent a telepathic message to Hydras, "Sir you might want to 
get here...only you are a match for Rodimus." Hydras growled. "The rest of you 
stay here Sharpclaw come with me." He turned into the dragon and flew towards 
flicker.
> 
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> Rodimus heard Condor over the comm, but didn't have time to reply. He knew that 
> the CR failed. Condor was gone. Rodimus let out an angered growl as he, somehow, 
> picks up even more speed.
> Eventually Rodimus had caught up with the rest of the Maximal force. They were 
> good troops.
> Rodimus starts to overtake them. He sees Flicker, but was still trailing.
> Rodimus yells out with so much anger that you would think he had gone mad. Maybe 
> he had.
> Rodimus Prime: FLICKER!!!!!!!!!! WITH PRIMUS HIMSELF AS MY WITNESS, I'M GOING TO 
> KILL YOU!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
>  cardhead649 <cardhead649@...> wrote:Flicker::
> 
> "Pretty dense, aren't you?" Flicker growls, taking aim again.  "An 
> expendable bot is useless as a hostage."  He fires, nearly point-
> blank.
> 
> Rolling away, he opens a channel to the Predacon base.  "Flicker to 
> Hydras!  My cover's been blown and I've got half the Maximal force on 
> my tail.  Request backup immediately!"  He relays the coordinates.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> > ::Aerotaur::
> >        He barrel rolls to the side to avoid the oncoming fire and 
> uses the 
> > momentary distraction to recover ground on Flicker.  He manages to 
> lower his 
> > voice this time.  "Look Flicker, I'm only going to say this once.  
> She has a 
> > baby.  If you want a hostage, take me.  She has someone who needs 
> her.  I 
> > don't.  I'm expendable."
>
